app.name: Blackout Condensed
app.description: A modification of the standard Blackout to use a condensed version of Roboto. A writing application should also include beautiful typography.

app.name: Translate
app.description: A Google Translate client for Gltn

app.name: Spotify Player
app.description: This panel gives users a variety of curated playlists to listen to while writing. This is done using Spotify's embed API, so you will need a Spotify account.

app.name: Word Cloud
app.description: A word cloud uses relative size to show the most common words in a document. The bigger the word, the more times it's used. This is useful for reducing any potential redundancy.

app.name: ToDo List
app.description: When writing a document, you may write straight down. You may skip a section and write a "todo" note for later. You may assign someone else to do that section. This can be done without installing this panel. What the panel does is finds and parses these inline notes to be easier to read.

app.name: Common Conversions
app.description: This provides constants and functions related to units and unit conversions.
